Min-Height

# Min-Height

## Usage

Please refer to the documentation on the Tailwind CSS website

## Compatibility

| Class              | Support        |
| ------------------ | -------------- |
| ```
min-h-0
```    | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
min-h-[n]
```  | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
min-h-full
``` | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
min-h-min
```  | 🌐 Web only    |
| ```
min-h-max
```  | 🌐 Web only    |
| ```
min-h-fit
```  | 🌐 Web only    |
